## Misc notes 

Changes that didn't make it into the changelogs: 

* There is only one demonic rune, treated like the Abyssal rune.
## Changelog 

### Stone Soup 0.9 (20110812) 

Disclaimer: These are merely the highlights, not an exhaustive list of changes. Save compatibility with the 0.8 release is retained, although once a game is loaded in 0.9, you can not go back to 0.8. 

### 0.9 Highlights 

* New skill training system. Experience pool and [victory dancing][17] are gone.
* [Ashenzari][18]: Remove passive XP boost, add a skill boost depending on level of boundedness and which equipment is bound.
* Rename Crusader to [Skald][19], change starting book and skill levels.
* New spells: [Inner Flame][20], [Shroud of Golubria][21].
* Removed spells: [Teleport Self][22], [Berserker Rage][23], [Resist Poison][24].
* New monsters: [Ignacio][25] (unique executioner), [catoblepas][26], [basilisk][27].
* New subgame: [Zot Defence][28]. Consider it of experimental quality, though.
### Skills 

* Skill training: skills are trained immediately when XP is gained. The skills trained are the ones that have been used recently (auto) or the ones which have been selected (manual).
* Skill costs: the XP to skill point ratio no longer depends on skill level.
* Magic school skills early game discount removed.
### Gods 

* [Cheibriados][29] gives full stat boost for fully ponderous, regardless of species.
* [Jiyva][30] is a little less likely to remove mutations.
* Improve [Jiyva][30]'s stat shuffling, take skills and armour into account.
* [Makhleb][31] has a new flavour description.
* Nerf [TSO][32]'s and [Makhleb][31]'s HP and MP on kills.
* [Trog][33] specialises in antimagic weapon gifts, gives fewer artefacts.
* [Trog][33] dislikes it when you train magic skills.
* [Yred][34] takes statue kills and forbids Statue Form.
* [Zin][35]'s Vitalisation is cheaper and cures petrification, stat boost stackable.
* Don't allow avoiding good god wrath by swapping via another good god.
* [Ashenzari][18]: Remove passive XP boost, add a skill boost depending on level of boundedness and which equipment is bound.
* [Ashenzari][18]: reduce reskilling XP penalty and some ability piety costs.
* [Ashenzari][18] wrath: reduce all skills for the duration of wrath.
### Character 

* +3 base HP for all characters.
* Racial HP/MP gain is now displayed on a -3 to +3 scale (see ?%).
* Fighting gives less HP boost.
* All characters carry a bootknife to dissect corpses.
* [Hill Orc][36][Priests][37] always take on [Beogh][38].
* Berserkitis mutation triggers less often.
* Tweak starting skills for a few backgrounds (Fi, Gl, Wr, CK).
* Give [Warpers][39] a few more darts of [dispersal][40].
* Let [Gladiators][41] start with a cap if they can't wear helmets.
* Start all [Hunters][42] with the same melee weapon.
* Start [Artificers][43] with quarterstaves, instead of letting [Monks][44] choose them.
* Rename Crusader to [Skald][19], change starting book and skill levels.
* [Conjurers][45] don't need to choose a book (they always get an Air/Ice book).
* [Felids][46]: lose a level on death, gain at most nine lives, improved aptitudes.
* [Draconians][47] are more dextrous.
* Berserk speed-up reduced to that of haste (1.5 instead of 2).
* All species take the same amount of time to use stairs.
### Interface 

* New command: 'D'rop last. Drops the item(s) last picked up.
* Auto-switch: bumping while wielding launcher switches to weapon in slots a/b.
* Auto-switch: firing while wielding melee weapon switches to launcher in a/b.
* Auto-explore tries to look at unreachable places.
* Search: allows searching for portals, and for waypoints (Ctrl-F 1, Ctrl-F *).
* Search: "branded" synonymous with "ego". Better help (Ctrl-F ?).
* Search: only show items in a stash matching the search.
* Search: allow searching for armour by equipment slot.
* New help for skills screen (m??).
* Change inventory colours for some potions.
* Auto-pickup chunks after [Animate Skeleton][48].
* Allow toggling hit prediction with ':' in new targetting modes.
* Cloud glyph in 7-bit ASCII is '0', not '#' anymore.
* Prompt before leaving [Ziggurat][49].
* Better butchering messages, less spam.
* Abort spellcasting in many cases where spells are guaranteed to fail.
* Display -cTele on the status line where controlled teleports are blocked.
* Allow redefining [mimic][50] glyphs, once identified.
* Show percentage progress to the next level, instead of number of XP points.
* Show 'chaotic' in monster status only when aiming silver ammo at them.
* Show 'mindless' in monster status only when using [Ely][51]'s healing abilities.
### Spells 

* New spell: [Shroud of Golubria][21] (comes in Skald and Warper starting books). Prevents some melee damage, but likely to break against more damaging attacks.
* New spell: [Inner Flame][20] (comes in starting book of Fire Elementalists). Causes targeted enemy to explode in a fireball when killed.
* Removed spells: [Teleport Self][22], [Berserker Rage][23], [Resist Poison][24].
* [Tornado][52]: radius starts low, increases over time, add cooldown, adjust damage.
* [Tornado][52] moves monsters within its radius around.
* [Blinking][53] with [Tornado][52] active reduces its duration, [teleporting][54] cancels it.
* Make [Fire Storm][55], [Ice Storm][56], [Bolt of Magma][57] and [Throw Icicle][58] more resistible.
* Increase [Bolt of Magma][57] damage.
* Give [Summon Dragon][59] a longer duration, summon two dragons at high power.
* [Shock][60] and [Lightning][61] will hit a creature at most twice; damage increased.
* Make [LRD][62] and [Sandblast][63] more strongly affected by monster AC again.
* Ranges of [Throw Frost][64]/[Flame][65] and of [Bolt of Cold][66]/[Fire][67] swapped.
* Increase [Flame Tongue][68]'s accuracy and range a little.
* [Sublimation of Blood][69] takes spellpower into account.
* [Apportation][70] takes spellpower into account for all items.
* [Statue][71] and [Dragon Form][72] balance: give both some [GDR][73], reduce unarmed damage.
* [Statue Form][71]: boost all melee damage, give 50% torment resistance.
* Increase [Ozocubu's Refrigeration][74] to level 6.
* Reduce [Summon Ice Beast][75] to level 4, [Static Discharge][76] to level 3.
* [Maxwell's Silver Hammer][77] works also on all [weapons][78] with bludgeoning damage.
* [Poison Weapon][79] works also on blunt [weapons][78].
* [Condensation Shield][80] duration increased.
* [Simulacra][81] from the spell are no longer abjurable.
* Renamed books: Chemistry -> [Alchemy][82], Zoology -> [Beasts][83].
### Monsters 

* [Catoblepas][26]: a new hard-hitting yak-genus monster with petrifying breath.
* Replace "gila monster" with "[basilisk][27]", complete with petrification.
* [Ignacio][25], a unique executioner of Makhleb, spawns in Pandemonium.
* AI: monsters improve even signature weapons (e.g. [Sigmund][84] will use [Finisher][85]).
* AI: confused high intelligence monsters don't move if next to a deadly cell.
* Allow polymorphing demons into other similar-tier demons.
* [Snapping turtles][86] and [Geryon][87] reach diagonally.
* Give [Shadow fiends][88] and [Tormentors][89] a pain-branded melee attack.
* Boost [ghost moth][90] damage, don't spawn them in [Spider's Nests][91].
* Fix random [pan lords][92] not getting [Symbol of Torment][93] in their spell sets.
* [Vampire bats][94] are undead.
* Monsters with mutagenic chunks leaves corpses less often.
* Reaching over a hostile monster may hit the monster between you and target.
* [Kenku][95] monsters come with gear, may spawn in the [Abyss][96].
* Rename "beast" to "[hell beast][97]".
* Rename "megabat" to "[bat][98]".
* [Kobolds][99] can (rarely) get crossbows.
* [Pikel][100]: fixed bugs with freed monsters.
* Adjust xp values for some monsters.
* Disable feature [mimics][50].
### Levels 

* New branch endings: multiple [Elf:5][101] maps, [Zot][102] entry vaults on D:27.
* Many other new [vaults][103], including serial vaults, traps, Abyss vaults.
* [Blink][53] in the [Abyss][96] only blinks; does not teleport anymore.
* [Baileys][104] are more sane in loot and threat.
* [Troves][105]: fix some bugs, and additional quests.
* [Vestibule of Hell][106] has its own monster set.
* Don't place kobold/orc/jelly/bee special rooms in the [Hells][107].
### Orb run 

* Double the orb's weight.
* Disable controlled teleports once the orb is picked up.
* Orb run spawns are more likely to spawn near the player.
* [Teleportation][108] may need longer to kick in.
### Items 

* Price reform: scrolls, potions, rings. Bad items cost more than 1 gold now.
* Cards: the Orb (new card), destruction cards buffed.
* Experience card gives less experience at low power.
* [Scroll of identify][109] shows top card when used on deck of cards.
* Picked up [runes][110] are no longer part of the inventory. They are listed in \.
* Randarts with the *Rage property trigger berserk less often.
* Modified spellbooks: [Conjurations][111], [Unlife][112], many elemental books.
* [Bucklers][113] provide less [SH][114].
* [Large rocks][115] can (rarely) be generated on the dungeon floor.
* Ammo of [dispersal][40] only disperses if it does damage.
* [Silver][116]-branded ammo only does bonus damage to chaotic creatures.
* Reduce [silver][116] and [steel][117] damage bonus.
* Reflected missiles get their full range on the way back.
* Randart heavy armours tend to come with better enchantment.
* [Wands][118] and [rods][119] rely more strongly on [Evocations][120] skill.
* Long blades: nerf [double swords][121], buff [demon blades][122], remove [katanas][123].
* Reduce [demon whip][124] and [demon trident][125] damage.
* Remove [knives][126]. Change [Spriggan's Knife][85] from knife to dagger.
* Make the [Sword of Zonguldrok][85] a double sword with the reaping [brand][127].
* Give [Undeadhunter][85] a disruption effect against undead instead of holy wrath.
* Make [Wyrmbane][85]'s enchantment increase whenever it kills a dragon.
* Give [Scythe of Curses][85] draining brand, inflict necro miscasts on its targets.
* [Mace of Brilliance][85] comes with a halo.
* [Singing Sword][85] does sonic damage at high tension.
* Bad unrandarts (Misfortune, Folly, Lear's) get a random appearance.
* Make [potions of berserk rage][128] more common.
### Tiles 

* Display halo radius, fix information disparity between tiles and console.
* Don't allow casting spells in -CAST equipment by clicking on spell icons.
* Only flying [pan lords][92] have tiles with wings.
* Many new or improved monster, dungeon and interface tiles.
### Options 

* Allow hiding the -cTele indicator with show_no_ctele.
* Allow automatically assigning specific spells to letters with spell_slot.
